question: [Calm] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.

qas.question: [Calm] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.
[Practice] Portugues: Informe how many samples were used in total com base no histograma.
[Study] English: State how many entries fall inside the modal bin based on the histogram.
